summary: The 'Advancing FASD Research, Services and Prevention Act' (FASD Respect Act) aims to amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize and expand the Fetal Alcohol Spectrum Disorders (FASD) prevention and services program. It focuses on increasing awareness, prevention, identification, and intervention efforts related to FASD. The bill provides grants for research, establishes centers of excellence, supports family services, and authorizes appropriations for fiscal years 2025-2029.
